art.author: sandy_medlock
art.post: I, too, just finished reading this wonderful book.  It made me feel even more anxious to go to heaven.  I’ve had a couple of life-threatening health emergencies  in the last 4 years during which I was afraid to die – first a stroke, then where I was short of breath and diagnosed with COPD, but now, thanks to Colton, I won’t fear it when the time really does come.I also miscarried a couple of babies, and I’m delighted to think that I may know them in heaven.  I’ve never even known their gender.   I only birthed one child, a son after the miscarriages, and he has also always wondered about the siblings he might have had.
art.title: More on Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Shroud
